    • getAdjustedPrice

      public double getAdjustedPrice(TicketPrice.MovieGoerAge age, Cinema cinema, GregorianCalendar date, CinemaMovie movie, PublicHolidayList phl, int seatRow)
      Gets adjusted price base on age, cinema type, date, movie type, public holiday and seat type
      Parameters:
      age - Age of moviegoer
      cinema - Type of cinema
      date - Date of movie
      movie - Movie
      phl - Public Holiday List
      seatRow - The row the chosen seat is located at
      Returns:
      Final adjusted price of ticket
